original_text: The priest who offers it for sin shall eat it. In a holy place it shall be eaten, in the court of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 죄를 위하여 제사 드리는 제사장이 그것을 먹되 곧 회막 뜰 거룩한 곳에서 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: The priest who offers it for sin
In a holy place it shall be eaten,
in the court of the tent of meeting.
